NodeJS.description: Can use NodeJS to create the backend of different type of apps. Can use its different npm packages according to needs.

ReactJS.description: Can use react to create the frontend of websites. Comfortable with function based react and using hooks, state, etc.

Express.description: Creating the backend of the website using Express framework. Applying different packages for authentication, database connections, etc.

MongoDB.description: Use MongoDB to store data for different applications. Create schemas using mongoose package.

SQL.description: Can use SQL for database functions. Can create database architecture and use that to implement tables.

EJS.description: Using template engine to display JavaScript on screen based on project needs. Use different features of template engines for features.

Github.description: Use version control to maintain structure of code. Used git for group project collaborations and maintaining app version.
